posts.postText:
I posted this in update befoe I saw Bug Report subforum.

New glitch showed up I know you got to know about it by now but I figure I'll be the one to put on the forum. Sometimes when people spawn they get the little pop up like you got a new weapon shows saying something along the lines of Massive Phaser Array or something like that. Nothing that affects game but something that came up .
